name: Weapon Dude
description:
Make and throw weapons at enemies for fun!

Space - Throw the first weapon in your inventory

Mouse - everything else

Sound Effects - https://opengameart.org/content/512-sound-effects-8-bit-style

Art assets - https://kenney.nl/assets/bit-pack

Music made by me.

Made for Miz Jam 1. Honestly the most fun i had while creating a game, still had a few ideas but time is an issue. OK im done, gonna go chill now, enjoy my game.
